mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.type AS "type", a.count AS "count", a.content AS "content", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.task_status AS "taskStatus", a.success_number AS "successNumber", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u6.name AS "createBy.name", a4.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u6 ON u6.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_area a4 ON a4.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hc_task( id, title, type, count, content, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag, area_id, task_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{type}, #{count}, #{content}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{area.id}, '9' )
mapper.update: UPDATE hc_task SET title = #{title}, type = #{type}, count = #{count}, content = #{content}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, task_status = #{taskStatus}, success_number = #{successNumber}, update_date = #{updateDate}, area_id = #{area.id} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE hc_task SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE hc_task SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE create_by = #{id}

UPDATE hc_task tt, ( SELECT c.task_id, SUM(c.send_number) AS send_number, SUM(c.success_number) AS success_number FROM hc_task t JOIN hc_task_child c ON t.task_status = '2' AND t.id = c.task_id GROUP BY c.task_id ) aa SET tt.success_number = aa.success_number, tt.task_status = (CASE WHEN tt.count = aa.send_number THEN '1' ELSE tt.task_status END) WHERE tt.id = aa.task_id
